1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relational operators for nested relations.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Rop
6  ( ropsNest,
7  ) where
8
9import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data               as D
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base           as Op
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Confl     as Op
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Deriv     as Op
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Flow      as Op
15
16-- | Implementation of relational operators.
17--
18--  [@chunk \/N ... \[-order \/P ...\]@]
19--    Split input relation into some chunks.
20--
21--  [@copy N R@]
22--    Naming input relation as @N@ in relmap @R@.
23--
24--  [@down \/N@]
25--    Enclose input relation in a term @\/N@.
26--
27--  [@for \/P R@]
28--    Convert nested relation @\/P@ by relmap @R@.
29--
30--  [@group \/N R@]
31--    Group tuples in @R@ by input relation.
32--
33--  [@hang \/N -on \/P ...@]
34--    Hang nested relation @\/N@ on @\/P@ ....
35--
36--  [@slice \/N \[R\]@]
37--    Add nested relation as output of relmap @R@.
38--
39--  [@slice-up R@]
40--    Slice, nested map, and lift up.
41--
42--  [@up \/P@]
43--    Lift up nested relation.
44
45ropsNest :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
46ropsNest = Op.ropList "nest"
47    --        CONSTRUCTOR       USAGE                       ATTRIBUTE
48    [ Op.def  Op.consChunk      "chunk /T ... [-order /P ...]"
49                                                            "-term* . -order"
50    , Op.def  Op.consCopy       "copy N R"                  "-var -relmap/^"
51    , Op.def  Op.consDown       "down /N"                   "-term"
52    , Op.def  Op.consFor        "for /N R"                  "-term -relmap/^"
53    , Op.def  Op.consGroup      "group R -to /N [-share /P ...]"
54                                                            "-relmap/ . -to -share?"
55    , Op.def  Op.consJoinUp     "join-up /P ..."            "-term*"
56    , Op.def  Op.consNest       "nest [~] /P ... -to /N"    "-term* . -to"
57    , Op.def  Op.consOppGroup   "opp-group R -to /N [-share /P ...]"
58                                                            "-relmap/ . -to -share?"
59    , Op.def  Op.consSelfGroup  "self-group /P ... -to /N"  "-term* . -to"
60    , Op.def  Op.consSelfGroup  "sg /P ... -to /N"          "-term* . -to"
61    , Op.def  Op.consSelfGroup  "hier /P ... -to /N"        "-term* . -to"
62    , Op.def  Op.consSlice      "slice /N [R]"              "-term -relmap/^?"
63    , Op.def  Op.consSliceUp    "slice-up R"                "-relmap/^"
64    , Op.def  Op.consUngroup    "ungroup /P"                "-term"
65    , Op.def  Op.consUp         "up /N"                     "-term"
66    ]
67
